Package cs.umass.edu.myactivitiestoolkit.view.fragments

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFragment
    Describes the application and displays the current version.
    AudioFragment
    Fragment used for interacting with the AudioService.
    ExerciseFragment
    Fragment which visualizes the 3-axis accelerometer signal, displays the step count estimates and current activity to the user and allows the user to interact with the AccelerometerService.
    HeartRateFragment
    Fragment which visualizes the PPG signal, displays the current heart rate measurement and allows the user to toggle the PPG sensor service.
    LocationsFragment
    Fragment which visualizes the stored locations along with their clusters and allows the user to select a clustering algorithm and change its parameters.
    SettingsFragment
    The Settings fragment allows the user to modify all shared applications preferences.
